postText: I have these ste of pots that are barely used, almost as good as new.
My sister got me these sweater dress but it is too small. Anyone wants it?
My daughter has outgrown these boots. They are up for grab!
I have some plates to give away!
We got a new fridge and I do not have need for this mini fridge anymore. Let me know if you want in the comment section
I have an extra winter jacket, medium size if anyone wants.
Does anyone have a storage bowls they can spare?
Does anyone need training wheels for the kid's bike?
